name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior ML Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing and implementing advanced Machine Learning (ML) solutions, including Deep Learning and Natural Language Processing (NLP) technologies. Proficient in using **Python**, **PyTorch**, and **Hugging Face** for building sophisticated models that enhance content understanding and information retrieval. Expertise in optimizing data pipelines for efficient inference, leveraging both **GPU** and **CPU** resources. Skilled in deploying robust ML workflows through hands-on experience with **Linux** environments.

In addition to ML competencies, I possess a comprehensive background as a Full Stack Developer, having delivered high-performance software solutions in healthcare and finance. Experienced with modern technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven track record in cloud-native application deployment on **Azure** and **AWS**, leading the development of secure, compliant systems that adhere to regulations like HIPAA, and PCI DSS. A results-driven professional passionate about creating impactful systems that leverage AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics and intelligent decision-making.

Created and managed **Inference** systems for real-time credit scoring and churn prediction directly integrated into backend services, enhancing decision-making speed by **40%**.
Leveraged **PyTorch** to build and deploy customized deep learning models, improving prediction accuracy on user behavior and transaction classifications by **25%**.
Utilized **Natural Language Processing** techniques to enrich content understanding and information retrieval systems, driving engagement and insights.

Developed and maintained automated testing frameworks to validate model performance and data integrity, increasing deployment success rate to **98%**.

Engineered and optimized data pipelines for machine learning applications using **Python** and **Linux**, ensuring efficient processing and robust performance.
Developed and implemented machine learning models with frameworks such as **PyTorch** and **Hugging Face** to enhance content understanding and natural language processing capabilities across multiple projects.
Managed experimentation and model inference workflows on **GPU** and **CPU** clusters, achieving optimizations that improved inference speed by over **30%**.
